summary: "Fifty Shades of Grey" is a popular book by E.L. James about a college grad, Anastasia, and her relationship with wealthy Christian Grey, who likes BDSM (a type of sexy role-playing). The book is part of a series and was a huge bestseller, but some people didn't like it because of its writing style and how it showed BDSM. It was made into a movie in 2015. The series has sold over 150 million copies and includes books telling the story from Christian's perspective.
title: Fifty Shades of Grey
